name: Lost In Transmission (Buttercream Dream)
description:
In Lost In Transmission you play from the perspective of two satellite engineers, one satellite fully functioning and operational and the other derelict and in need of repairs. Two operators are connected by a radio, you as the player are able to switch between their perspectives.

It is up to you to fix the space station. Solve puzzles by switching between the point of view of both astronauts, search the operational station for solutions to fixing the broken station.

Controls-
Mouse: Camera

Left Click: Interact

Switch Ship: Tab

W/A/S/D: movement

Space: Jump
